name: Troublemaker of Tides
text:
Flash
Flood {2}{u}{u} (During your turn, you may pay {2}{u}{u} and exile this card from your hand flooding target land. It loses all land types and abilities, and it gains “{T}: Add {1}.”)
Whenever you flood Troublemaker of Tides or it enters the battlefield, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner’s hand.
